title: General form
text: If "s varies directly with the square of t," then the general form of our relationship will be $$s={kt}^2$$.

title: Finding k
text: The constant k can be found by dividing s by $$t^2$$.

title: Evaluating k
text: k $$=$$ $$\frac{s}{t^2}$$. If $$s=16$$ when $$t=1$$, what is k?

title: Finding new s value
text: Now we know our relationship is $$s=16t^2$$. To find how long it takes to fall $$144$$ feet, we can set $$s=144$$ and solve for $$t$$.
